purpose: The email announces an international call for applications for a tenure-track Assistant Professor position in Informatics Engineering at the University of Coimbra, focusing on Dependability or Software Engineering. It invites strong candidates to apply before the deadline of August 7, 2025, and encourages sharing the opportunity with potential applicants.
evidence_sentences: The Department of Informatics Engineering at the University of Coimbra (Portugal) is pleased to announce an international call for applications for one tenure-track position at the level of Assistant Professor in the field of Informatics Engineering, with a focus on the sub-areas of Dependability or Software Engineering.

Please feel free to share this opportunity with strong candidates who may be interested in a permanent position at a leading European university and looking to advance their careers in an excellent academic environment.
